channel.title: What two sounds combine good to create one lead?
channel.description:
I've ran into a bit of a creative block with most of my Auxy projects, and I find that the problem is that I run out of good sounds to use. A workaround I've discovered for this is to use two sounds with the same loops to create one, different sound. The problem is that I'm not quite finding what I'm looking for, which is a lead that would fit well for a trance track (I am trying to create trance music since it is one of my favorite genres).
**TLDR: Has anybody else found any good combinations of sounds to create a solid (but not bombastic) lead that would fit well for trance music?**

item.title: What two sounds combine good to create one lead?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
Stress + Hour
Hour + Noir
Stress + Stress, but an octave up w/ some highpass

Read full topic
item.source: What two sounds combine good to create one lead?

item.title: What two sounds combine good to create one lead?
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
THE POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS!!! XDDDD

everyone has a different combo, this is awesome.
I used Gossip and a Toned out Stress for my leads in Numb to the Core, which turned out annoying and awesome at the same time.
I made the bass slope sound awesome with a lot of things as well.

Read full topic
